title: Isuan a ko fo che u
lyrics:
Isuan a ko fo che u,
Chaute u, amah pan r'u;
A chhandam ngei ang che u,
A kawng hawn ula.

A kawng lo hawn la,
A kawng lo hawn la,
A chhandam ngei dawn a che,
A kawng lo hawn la.

Chhandam turin a lo kal,
I tan a nunna a pe;
A thlan ata a tho ta,
A kawng lo hawn la.

Lal Isuan a nghak reng che,
Amah I pan hma loh zawng;
I rilru a lawm em ang,
A kawng I hawn chuan.

Isua hnenah lo kal la,
Chhandamna a hnaih chhung hian;
Chhandamtu mual liam hma hian,
A kawng hawn thuai rawh.
